posts.post_content: I really like using this on a lot of red vampires ([Havengul Vampire](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Havengul Vampire), [Falkenrath Exterminator](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Falkenrath Exterminator), [Markov Blademaster](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Markov Blademaster), etc.) to get +1/+1 counters on them easier. posts.post_content: *Haste doesn't even make sense here. What, are you supposed to miraclecast [Reforge the Soul](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Reforge the Soul), draw into an inexpensive creature and this, then cast them both? [Arcane Teachings](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Arcane Teachings) feels just as awkward at first, but at least it gives a big P/T boost (rewarding you quite a bit for figuring out how to use it) and gave you a pretty sweet blocker.*
posts.html:
Haste doesn't even make sense here. What, are you supposed to miraclecast Reforge the Soul, draw into an inexpensive creature and this, then cast them both? Arcane Teachings feels just as awkward at first, but at least it gives a big P/T boost (rewarding you quite a bit for figuring out how to use it) and gave you a pretty sweet blocker.
